items.name: Harry Potter Answers
items.title: Harry Potter Answers
items.headline: Welcome to the Harry Potter Answers Wiki!
items.desc:
Got a question about the Harry Potter franchise, whether it be about the seven books, eight films, many video games, the history, or anything else - ask it here!

We have thousands of already answered questions, and new ones are being asked every day. Come join us and ask a new question or answer someone else's!
